name: Ext_R2_StructureDefinition_constrainedType
title: Cross-version Extension for R2.StructureDefinition.constrainedType for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents StructureDefinition.constrainedType from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/StructureDefinition|1.0.2 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Any datatype or resource, including abstract ones
element.definition: The type of type that is being constrained - a data type, an extension, a resource, including abstract ones. If this field is present, it indicates that the structure definition is a constraint. If it is not present, then the structure definition is the definition of a base structure.
element.comment: `StructureDefinition.type` maps to R4 `StructureDefinition.type`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: Any datatype or resource, including abstract ones

If this field is present, it indicates that the structure definition is a constraint. If it is not present, then the structure definition is the definition of a base structure.
element.comment: `StructureDefinition.type` maps to R4 `StructureDefinition.type`.  So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Either a resource or a data type.
